name: Golfootball
description:
Pronounced "Golf Football"

Controls:

A - Move ball left

D - Move ball left 

SPACE - Increase power

Left Click on Ball - To shoot the ball 

A Mini Golf game based around the theme of football. Ive took aspects from the game and made them holes in this one.

Potential Bugs to be aware off:

On certain holes when you move left or right with the ball, it snaps to a position you probably didn't want to.
